title: Surat Man Collapses And Dies While Playing Garba In Mt Abu, Family In Shock
text:
Navratri celebration turned fatal for this Gujarati family, when a man collapsed and died on the spot while dancing at a garba event. Jagdish had come from Gujarat to Mount Abu, Rajasthan.

The incident happened when Jagdish was enjoying with his friends when all of a sudden he died, and his last moments were captured on camera. Yogesh a friend of Jagdish told India Today that six couples from Surat had come to Mount Abu after a trip to the Ambaji temple in Gujarat on Sunday evening. They were going to stay in Mount Abu for two days.

He said, "We reached the hotel in the evening, had dinner and then we saw that the hotel was hosting a garba night so we decided to attend that."

Times Now

A video from the Garba event in Mount Abu shows everyone enjoying the festivities and dancing to the popular garba song ‘Chogada Tara’ when Jagdish suddenly collapses. The crowd takes some moments to comprehend what has happened then rushed to help him.

"As we were dancing, suddenly Jagdish fell to the ground and started bleeding from his mouth. We took him to the Global Hospital," Yogesh added. The doctors declared him brought dead.

The sudden death of Jagdish has sent his friends into a state of shock and mourning.
